Infinitive.text: The infinitive is one of the
verb forms of Hebrew and Aramaic

tokens.text: verb forms of Hebrew and Aramaic

Infinitive.targetSubtopic: Verb forms of Hebrew and Aramaic
Infinitive.targetTopic: Verb forms of Hebrew and Aramaic

tokensOfLine.text: An example of an infinitive in English is “to run.”
An infinitive describes an action without specifying who is doing it.
